name: hiddenbattle
description: Play a sophisticated strategic sea battle style game with no-touch placement rules and special ships.

scripts.dup: pmd cpd --minimum-tokens 50 --dir ./src/ --exclude ./src/node_modules --language ecmascript your_command | tee staticAnalysis/dup/duplications.txt
scripts.topFanOut: jq -r '.modules[] | "\(.dependencies|length) \(.source)"' staticAnalysis/depcruise/deps.json | sort -nr | head -20 | tee staticAnalysis/depcruise/deps_fanout.txt
scripts.topFanIn: jq -r '.modules[] | .dependencies[] .resolved' staticAnalysis/depcruise/deps.json | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr | head -20 | tee staticAnalysis/depcruise/deps_fanin.txt
